app.name: Hide ticket assignee
app.short_description: Hide assignee field on ticket when 'hide_assignee' tag exists on user. Also hides the assignee field if the current user's role is light agent.
app.long_description: Hide assignee field on ticket when 'hide_assignee' tag exists on user. Also hides the assignee field if the current user's role is light agent.
app.installation_instructions:
* Click Install. 
* Add 'hide_assignee' tag to users who don't need access to Sharing field.
